page.title: 12OLD GRAVE YARD AND VINE
page.content:
{THE OLD GRAVEYARD There is an old graveyard at Kippen Cross with graves dating back to the 15th century.One grave of particular interest belongs to James Ure of Shirgarton,a well known Covenanter.
{THE OLD VINE Up at the top of the village is a housing estate called The Old Vinery which is built on the site of the largest vine under glass in Europe.The roots were said to stretch as far as the River Forth about two miles away.It belonged to the Buchanan family and was cut down in 1964. Off-shoots were sold and are still growing in and around Kippen and all over the world.
